item.title: The Importance Of History
item.description: History, what is it good for? When I interview someone I often ask, “Where did object oriented programming (OOP) come from?” There generally isn’t a right or wrong answer to this in the interview. You can go look up whether a particular answer is consistent with what’s on the internet. However you could give several answers that would all be right. You might say, “it was pioneered in Sketchpad.” Or you might say, “it came out of the atom in LISP.
